title: Beijing Tech Crackdown: Richard Liu, billionaire founder of JD.Com, steps down as CEO - Economic Times
content: Beijing Tech Crackdown: Richard Liu, billionaire founder of JD.Com, steps down as CEO  Economic Times
description: Chinese eCommerce giant JD.COM's CEO has stepped down because of the tech crackdown, and now, the president of the company, XU Lei, will become the new CEO.
